text.section: In this section, "officer" means any officer that a Maryland corporation is required or permitted to have under § 2-412 of the Corporations and Associations Article.

section.section: Except for the receipt of reasonable remuneration in conformity with § 14-139 of this subtitle, an officer of a nonprofit health service plan may not use the position of officer for personal or financial enrichment.
A violation of this subsection shall be considered an unsound or unsafe business practice under § 14-116 of this subtitle.
